channel.title: Peppa Pig on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Peppa Pig on Game6r

item.title: Game Peppa Pig builds a house
item.description: The game Peppa Pig builds a house is a kind of constructor, where every kid can test himself as a builder. Today the heroine decided to please her father and build a small house for him. But everything turned out to be not as easy for Peppa as she expected. Now the pig is asking you for help in such a difficult but important matter. In order to simplify the task, tips and advice from a real specialist are waiting for you in the game.

item.title: Peppa Pig basketball game
item.description: The game Peppa Pig Basketball will allow you to take part in a dynamic competition along with the pigs. Use your mouse to choose the direction and strength of the ball. The more of them in the basket, the better the result will be. Try not to make mistakes and aim accurately, trying to score a goal and win the attention of the public.
